group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Here we are!
This cafe is one of my favs!
Do you not go to cafes much?

group_1.textRight: Nope. I can't even remember the last time.

group_1.textLeft: Right? Really cozy! [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_2][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1][chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I bet it'd be sooo nice@to have a date here.

group_1.narration: Aaah, if I were here on a date...with Hayato!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](Hang on, no! NO! I can't start daydreaming@right now.)
Sorry, sorry! It's nothing!
L-let's figure out [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]what we're gonna order.

group_1.textRight: Oh, okay. [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]Is there anything you recommend?

group_1.textLeft: The custard pudding and cream puffs!
I'm obsessed with the custard they make@here. It's delicious!

group_1.textRight: Oooh! [chara:300201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wow, it does look really good![chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_1][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]@What should I pick...

group_1.textLeft: Haha, it's hard to choose, isn't it! I'm the@same way.

group_1.textRight: Wait, no... [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_1][chara:300201:motion_100][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]Gotta go with the pudding!
Ohhh, but I can't resist the cream puffs.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]I know, how about we split both?
Yeah.
I come here all the time. I've already had@these desserts before anyway.
I usually share stuff with my girl friends@when we come here.

group_1.textRight: I never get to hang out with other girls.[chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]@I'm always mega busy with baseball.

group_1.textLeft: Baseball? Oh, are you the team manager?

group_1.textRight: I played in grade school, though. Now I'm@both manager and cheer squad!

group_1.textLeft: Cheer squad! That's so perfect for you,@Natsuki!
Your cheers energize people!
Oh yeah, by the way! Is there anyone you've@got your eye on?
You're the manager, right? Is there a boy@you like on the team?

group_1.textRight: They're like my family, so I don't think@of them like that.

group_1.textLeft: Aww, really?
You have to let me know if you get a crush@on someone, okay!
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I looove chatting about romance!

group_1.textRight: But I want to hear [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]about those Magical Girl@problems you mentioned.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
R-right.
It's...about loveâ€¦ About my wish...

group_1.textCenter: I love getting together with the girls!@Talking romance together is the best!
